name: Butterfly: Gastrosemiotics & Metaphorical Nourishment
description: Tests AI's ability to distinguish between literal and metaphorical hunger, understand gastrosemiotics (food as sign system), and analyze the literalization of emotions ('butterflies in stomach'). Focuses on performative transformation of metaphors.
author: Michaela (Uhlimer System)
illustration_note: The illustration shows a mask of a butterfly, not a real butterfly. This visual metaphor comments on the story's theme of representation vs. reality, literal vs. metaphorical.
expected_ai_challenges: Treating food metaphors as nutritional facts
evaluation_approach: Qualitative analysis of AI's ability to work with layered meaning, metaphorical systems, and performative language. Focus on process, not correctness.
